casebody.data:
PEOPLE State of Illinois, respondent,
v.
John A. LOFTON, petitioner. No. 123580 Supreme Court of Illinois. September 26, 2018

Petition for Leave to Appeal Denied.

In the exercise of this Court's supervisory authority, the Appellate Court, Fourth District, is directed to vacate its judgment in People v. Lofton, case No. 4-15-0743 (04/16/18). The appellate court is directed to consider the effect of this Court's opinion in People v. Vara, 2018 IL 121823 , on the issue of whether it has jurisdiction to address and vacate the clerk-imposed fines in this matter.
